hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:‘A miscarried fetus sent before me is dearer to me than a horseman whom I leave behind.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ أُصِيبَ بِسِقْطٍ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning one who suffers from a miscarriage
